title: Update Equal Breathing intro paragraph dummy copy

requirements.summary: Replace the Equal Breathing Exercise Info intro paragraph with screenshot-like English dummy text while leaving all other page content unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When opening Exercise Info for exerciseId="equal-breathing", the intro paragraph under the “Equal Breathing” title contains screenshot-like dummy text (English) rather than the current/empty copy.
Only the intro paragraph content is changed (the element corresponding to /html/body/div/div/main/div/p[1]); no other sections, layout, or components are modified.

file_operations.description: Update only EXERCISE_INFO_CONTENT['equal-breathing'].intro to screenshot-like English dummy copy (matching the provided screenshot tone/structure), without changing any other exercise content or any section content (Benefits/Method/Instructions/etc.).
